name: Serena Bistro and Lounge
address: 96 Page Ave, Staten Island, NY 10309, USA

reviews.text: I recently had my engagement party here for a private event & it was absolutely AMAZING ! The food , service , and vibe was a 10 out of 10 . All of our guests raved about the drinks as well . Erol , Mike , and their team are great ! Will definitely be back for dinner and a fun night out .

We came to Serena Bistro with a group of 17 and had an absolutely amazing experience! The pre-fix menu was perfect ‚Äî every dish was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The drinks were also fantastic and complemented the food perfectly.

The service was outstanding from start to finish ‚Äî attentive, friendly, and accommodating, even with a large party like ours. You can really tell the staff cares about making sure everyone has a great time.

If you‚Äôre celebrating with a group and want a place that feels upscale without breaking the bank, this is the spot. We‚Äôll definitely be back!

Really love this restaurant.  Each time I come here, I have a new favorite dish and they are always adding something new to the menu.   Hands down, my fave smash burger.   I‚Äôm also a huge fan of their spicy rigatoni, chicken scarpiello (to die for), and their branzino.  They have amazing appetizers and cocktails as well.   The staff is always inviting and friendly with great attention to the table.  This place is a 5 star all around for me, and my kids love coming here too!
Fantastic vibe, framed screens all over, good food, great DJ, but the saxophone guy that they bring in to do a small show was amazing.

Serena Bistro is amazing! The food was delicious, the drinks were perfect, and the atmosphere was fun and lively. The staff was super friendly and made the night even better. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

We recently hosted our engagement party at Serena Bar and Bistro, and I cannot thank the team enough for the incredible experience they provided. From start to finish, everything was handled with such care, professionalism, and attention to detail.

The ambiance was absolutely perfect ‚Äì warm, stylish, and intimate, exactly what we were hoping for. The food was outstanding; our guests are still talking about how delicious everything was! The drinks were beautifully crafted, and the service throughout the evening was seamless.

A special thank you to Erol and Mike, who went above and beyond to make sure everything ran smoothly. They were attentive, friendly, and made all of our guests feel welcome and looked after.

Thank you, Serena, for helping make our engagement celebration so memorable. It truly was a night we‚Äôll never forget. We‚Äôre so grateful and wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to recommend you to anyone looking to host a special event!

I went to Serena with my friend and we had a blast! The place is beatiful and they have entertainment which was super fun. The dance show was great and dancers were very engaging. The drink are super fancy !
Definitely will be back
Pretty good food.
The food was excellent. The staff very warm and accommodating, and they went out of their way to celebrate My Sister‚Äòs birthday with music happy birthday sign, and sparkles.
The best lounge on Staten Island. Great drinks, food, and service.

OK, let‚Äôs just start from the beginning the place was amazing. The people was working there is also fabulous. My problem was the waitress wasn‚Äôt the best. We order the food for my wife and I my wife food didn‚Äôt come complete the waitress say my wife say to him to put it on hold and she never said that my food was cold. The first you drink my wife have was amazing so she ordered a second one and it was horrible. We are the sparkling water and he got us regular water. I don‚Äôt know why the music was too loud. You can‚Äôt hear yourself speaking and at the end, my wife order me a dessert, lava cake I don‚Äôt know. How do you call that lava cake. We was looking forward for that date night and it didn‚Äôt go. How did we expect it I don‚Äôt think so. We will go back there or recommended it to anyone.

Atmosphere was nice the food was good and service was great. My only complaint was the seating. I was told the restaurant was booked with reservations when I got to the restaurant at 630 pm on a Saturday. I was seated at a high top table,‚Ä¶

Food was alright I had the chicken francese and appetizers was the classic calamari and to drink was lychee martini .. first of we didn‚Äôt had a reservation (granted) they could of put us in one of the soo many tables that was open we stayed‚Ä¶
Great food , the music is great and the atmosphere is great time .
Food and atmosphere is amazing.
Horrible experience. Rude and dismissive, mediocre food at best and the wait time for a reserved table was outrageous! Almost 2 hours!!  Unapologetic! Never again
manager had a horrible and i mean terrible attitude. came here for my cousins bday and it was extremely tight . there was no room for the servers to pass by.

I was heading to Serena to meet up with a very close friend to pick something up from him. I was then introduced to one of the owners Mike he was a complete gentleman and very friendly I also was introduced to the bartender Britney who was‚Ä¶
Sick vibe and amazing food
Everything from the food to the hospitality was impeccable. Perfect way to spend my birthday
One of the best experiences I‚Äôve had in Staten Island. Can‚Äôt wait to go back!

I don‚Äôt know about you but I didn‚Äôt know you could find such lovely upscale dining in SI. Went here with a friend and was pleasantly surprised by the classic food and the beautiful ambiance. Staff was so friendly and inviting. My friend got‚Ä¶

Very good food with perfect service

Muy buena comida con un servicio perfecto.
Food and drinks absolutely amazing !! All the tequila you can drink of.  TVs all around any sports persons dream !! Sexy n fun spot !!
Had my birthday here amazing atmosphere food and service must try !
The quality here is consistently high, and unlike many lounges and restaurants on Staten Island, they don't dilute their drinks.
I came her with my brother. Service was fine, bar is nice. All the apps we ordered was great. The main dishes were All so good. Good size portions. Prices were fair. I would definitely go back.

Great service great food and a very beautiful venue, seating in the booth was really nice and comfortable. We were there for birthday on a Friday night everyone loved everything they had from pulpo skewers steak skewers crispy tuna fresh‚Ä¶
Hands down one of the best resturaunts on the island from service , to food , to drinks
Serena Bistro should be on the top of your list. A must try! Food was delicious and atmosphere is amazing. Bar is excellent, food was great and staff was helpful!
Enjoyed my meal here with family.. service was excellent ‚Ä¶. Definitely recommend!

Great atmosphere DJ was fantastic mix of everything and on top of that, the food was delicious. This is the perfect Saturday night dinner spot. Had the tomahawk steak was cut and cooked as to our likings, and the strawberry margarita was perfectly made. Will come back to try the seafood side of the menu.

I think the food was good & the atmosphere for Staten Island was nice. GREAT DRINKS! Although the dancers are beautiful there really wasn‚Äôt much room for them to perform. Service was ok. Pretty friendly staff. Prices were fair.
Amazing, food is delicious and entertainment and staff is great and classy!
Great place all around; food, drinks, atmosphere, and staff
Great place all around; food, drinks, atmosphere, and staff‚ù§Ô∏è
Happy hour every day from 4-7

We went to Serena this past weekend to celebrate my friend bday, we had a blast! The decor is fantastic and the food as well, I got the Serena Plateu it was simply delicious. The music selection was great too and they also had a lovely show‚Ä¶
Very nice place and i loved the  Samu Samba Show ü•∞‚Ä¶

Oh man lol.. staten island may have the worst food scene in the country. Why does every restaurant turn into a nightclub? Blasting loud music while im eating dinner really isn‚Äôt fun. We could barely talk to each other. No bueno.
Amazing place, the food and drink is delicious and the samba show we saw was breathtaking very engaging and classy! Love it!, very recommended
Came here for dinner with friends for a fun Saturday night.  We were not disappointed.  The decor was amazing, food was great.  Will definitely be back for another great night.
